Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `/path/to/bcl`. Path to the (untarred) BCL files
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `/path/to/bcl`. Path to the (untarred) BCL files. Expects 'RunParameters.xml' at './'.

sample_sheet.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `SampleSheet.csv`. The path to the sample sheet
sample_sheet.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `SampleSheet.csv`. The path to the sample sheet.

output.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.output`, example: `/path/to/output`. The folder to store the demux results
output.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.output`, example: `/path/to/output`. The folder to store the demux results

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
